scripts.deploy-devnet: anchor build -- --features devnet && anchor deploy --program-name pie --provider.cluster https://api.devnet.solana.com --provider.wallet public/devnet-admin.json
scripts.deploy-mainnet: anchor build && anchor deploy --program-name pie --provider.cluster mainnet --provider.wallet .local/mainnet/admin.json -- --max-sign-attempts 20 --with-compute-unit-price 100000
scripts.rebuild-devnet: rm -rf target && mkdir -p target/deploy && cp -f public/pie-keypair.json target/deploy/pie-keypair.json && anchor keys sync && anchor build -- --features devnet
scripts.rebuild-mainnet: rm -rf target && mkdir -p target/deploy && cp -f .local/mainnet/pie-keypair.json target/deploy/pie-keypair.json && anchor keys sync && anchor build
